ygData.subject: Re: JBoots, Rubi & Beyond
ygData.msgSnippet: In a message dated 10/11/99 1:49:19 PM Eastern Daylight Time, cobb@systemsexpress.com writes:
ygData.messageBody:
In a message dated 10/11/99 1:49:19 PM Eastern Daylight Time,
cobb@... writes:

<<
I have never tried it on other people, but I don't see why it wouldn't
work on them either.
>>

Well I wouldn't assume this. Hardly any of our spells work on other people.
Does it make sense that we can cast See Invisi on others but not Heat Sight?
Also, keep in mind that Identify Magic spell is gonna be taken out of the
game soon and replaced with a new spell (all who have Identify magic will
auto recieve new spell I think).

Wizaro Wrathcaster
28th Flame of Solusek's Fire
